title: Mark Buxton Perfumes | Spiritual Healing
description: Spiritual Healing Perfume by Mark Buxton - 100ml the bottle for 140,00 euros. A pure balance of a sexual exchange. A facetted fragrance around osmanthus absolute. Davana and blackcurrant buds enhance the feminine thrill. While elder berry absolute and cistus exalt the masculine sensuality.
cleaned_text: Fusion between man and woman A pure balance of a sexual exchange. A facetted fragrance around osmanthus absolute. Davana and blackcurrant buds enhance the feminine thrill. While elder berry absolute and cistus exalt the masculine sensuality. Top: Davana, Blackcurrant
